title: Season 8 is HERE!

replies.body: 2 days later and you were on point about the placement posts

Hextech loot boxes per champ reset!
That's all I care about, ARAM 4 lyf yo.
we are totally in the same boat

Honestly im so excited, lets see if we can beat last years posts! 
So glad Riot had TWO popups this year explaining that you're gonna end up lower than you ended last season even if you won all of your placements

Good luck, have fun ♥

I think the issue with many people's posts is not so much _"What? Why am I lower?"_ _(we all know that we will likely end up lower)_ but rather _"Why am I bronze 3 when I was gold 4? lower"_.

Which in my opinion is a fair enough argument.
People want to climb, if you've managed to climb to gold for 3 years in a row, why should you have to prove you can do it AGAIN, why not let them use that time to attempt to climb higher? instead of spending half a year proving they can get to the same spot they've been getting to for years in a  row.

I think part of the problem of why we get these _"Why am I?"_ posts, is that we are dealing with a system that gives us no information on how it works. It's like trying to solve a maths equation where the "+ - % x" symbols  are twinked out. We put in all our numbers _(our wins, rank and LP etc)_, and then get a seemingly random number spat out. Because we cant actually see the workings.

So naturally people get annoyed, it's hardly their fault.
Imagine trying to solve a rubiks cube in the dark and then being hit over the head for not solving it properly.

Ugh, ranked in this meta?

No thanks.
